description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. You are a robot that is suffering from memory loss and is partially damaged. After being re-booted, you discover that your neural network is different from the other bots and the cause is tied to Project Crossover. Journey through the open world discovering the secrets of Project Crossover and how you can save the bots from the Agency.
description.short: You are a robot that is suffering from memory loss and is partially damaged. After being re-booted, you discover that your neural network is different from the other bots and the cause is tied to Project Crossover. Journey through the open world discovering the secrets of Project Crossover and how you can save the bots from the Agency.
